sentences.sContent: If someone else is paying for your trip then they should consider providing the same information about their finances and employment.
sentences.sContent_eng: If someone else is paying for your trip then they should consider providing the same information about their finances and employment.
sentences.sCn: 如果其他人将支付您的旅行费用，此人也应该考虑提供关于其资金及工作的信息。

sentences.sContent: Remember, you can improve anything in your life — your weight, marriage, finances or health — by capitalizing on incremental change and radical change.
sentences.sContent_eng: Remember, you can improve anything in your life — your weight, marriage, finances or health — by capitalizing on incremental change and radical change.
sentences.sCn: 记住，通过增量改变和彻底改变，你生命中的任何东西都可以改进——你的体重、婚姻、经济或者健康。
